documents.document: I'm an irrational asshole when I'm overtired, too. Has anyone just tried putting the toddler-in-chief to bed at 10pm?
Few songs make me wish I could play an instrument like "I Will Possess Your Heart."
Me: Taco Bell made a taco shell out of fried chicken. Dan: There's hope for America after all.
@Katieiscrafty [zipped mouth emoji]
If you're not giving ratings to those making a reality show out of the highest court in the land, The Parent Trap (LiLo) is on E!.
If my kid keeps up this level of high pitched screaming, neighbors are going to think I stole Ollie the bobcat.
@kellyrand No alcohol yet, but definitely the other three. @EmmyA2
@mazzie Yeah. Only on our way back through, though. Can't believe that it's something we have to resort to, however.
@mazzie We are in March. Planning to delete all social media from phones and act like luddites.
Sandwiches at @TaylorGourmet aren't even CLOSE to being as good as Chik-fil-A's, and I easily gave those up, too. https://t.co/tjedxR3mCV
This baby's racking up protests faster than teeth. https://t.co/88k3AaHSZF
Well, looks like we have a new family hobby on the weekends. #muslimban #regufeeswelcome https://t.co/RiZLRzz9LK
I guess protesting shit that ignorant bigots are trying to get away with is my new weekend hobby.
I gave away a bunch of blank white cardboard at the #WomensMarch because I didn't think I would need a new one every fucking week. Jesus.
Was looking for this. DC, let's 👏 show 👏 the 👏 fuck 👏 up on Sunday. 1-3, WH. #resist #protest https://t.co/wHkEMJCH4N
Parenthood means never getting to do anything you want or need to. Apparently.
@lsarsour Did you know "Sarsour" is an anagram of "US roars?" Thank you for your work.👍
Drivers and staff of @UPS are lying fuckwits and I hate them.
Frankly, is there proof getting punched by a member of the minority ISN'T what redeemed Draco? I think it helped. https://t.co/r9rJH0CwkQ
@TweetingNaoto @adamihasegawa kneW, not knee. Baby on hip. https://t.co/7bT4CFpK1H
@TweetingNaoto @adamihasegawa Have you seen @PunchedToMusic?
@TweetingNaoto @adamihasegawa I knee exactly where this was going to go and I am still cackling with tears streaming 😂😂😂
I thought Snape and Dumbledore already covered this question. https://t.co/eLGcORfl1u
4 am and this crazy-ass wind is waking my baby up. She doesn't even have an exterior window in her room right now.
@mstharrington The pseudonym is how I recognized this while scrolling!
That time a viral FB post reminds you that you owe @mstharrington a DM. 😍 https://t.co/79VcqsNtw4
If someone wrote fiction that went the way @markbaumer's story did, I would think it was too heavy handed with the symbolism. Jesus. 😢
@nicoleindc Yes, but a Getty image. I am not that tall.
I thought a lot about Abigail Adams yesterday, so I made a thing. #WomensMarch https://t.co/bhpyc8egws
Second up: that first postcard should tell your senator to give ME a senator. #DCStatehood https://t.co/sBM5BP9G9E
@JessicaValenti And it took an hour and a half after the first tweet to send this one.
Baby was super chill all day at the #WomensMarch, but don't worry! She's been making up for it for over an hour. https://t.co/W1ZsUiv9hb
Future @ggwash contributor right here. https://t.co/ZSmvzfxNeq
@Aviatrixt We saw that one! ♡ @dylanmarron
@hodgman @nytimes But they'll be able to reuse it pretty much every day. Work smarter, not harder.
@AdamSerwer Then you might appreciate this one I spotted, too. @CAwkward https://t.co/mt3mvhAVRg
@70Ceeks @1followernodad @davedittell Hope you guys had fun in our fair city! Thank you for coming.
@WhitfordBradley if this is in DC, I definitely saw her!
I am in awe of the sheer numbers in this crowd. But I am crying because we all should have been here yesterday. #womensmarchonwashington
Thanks to @timkrepp for the sign inspiration. #WomensMarchOnWashington https://t.co/wpHUXXYkZm
@pattonoswalt DC followed your advice! Lotsa visitors to my artsy shop; we made postcards to send to mosques that have been threatened. ♡
@NobAkimoto Totally fair. I know lots of people have thought of others in similar situations and we march in your honor. ♡
Had 10 extra envelopes, made 10 extra double-sided signs to hand out. See you tomorrow. #ImWithHer #WomensMarchDC https://t.co/peUoxllpJ8
I deliberately unfollowed this AM but was back to following a minute ago. Check @VP & @FLOTUS too. https://t.co/YpcHbjN9l7
An RV covered in that asshole's name just parked itself blocking two lanes of K St NE traffic. Not as a protest, just because dicks.
"I've found the president has very little influence on my life so I don't care either way." -- SHOCKINGLY, a cis hetero white dude to me
My toilet just clogged so my life will literally be a shitshow at noon. Seems appropriate.
@geekylonglegs Don't watch. Jackass only understands ratings and transcripts will be available later.
I used to be so optimistic.
@PhilPhorward Oh yeah, I am well and fully fucked there, too.
@PhilPhorward Debating what countries I can move to while teething baby fucks my nipples up while battling PPD/PPA. It's been rough. 😕 You?
@barnswallowkate I think I read Twitter archived them and moved them to a POTUS44 acct or somesuch.
@miss_sequential I am so glad the march is happening on Saturday or I would have had to leave town for the weekend/rest of my life.
Saw my first red hatted jackass tonight, and then five dozen more. I've been here a dozen years and never felt less safe in my city.
@lgstrick My fingers are crossed for you!

@UnburntWitch Goddammit, you're telling us you're NOT Chuck Tingle?!
(Also, thank you for your brave post.)
@Bethesdaist I have had his songs stuck in my head for two days despite not having heard them in a long time, and now I know why!
@CapitolRomance (Though she is being pretty cute right now.) https://t.co/O1TejgJG2e
@CapitolRomance Relatedly: fuck fucking. Never again.
To be fair, you could take the Uber part out and it'd still be true. https://t.co/lKGnJesTXI

Remember when my kid slept through the night for a hot minute & I thought I might have a normal life again someday?
Yeah, me either.
@beyonddc YOU add the gap when you say it because you don't mind being wrong, apparently.
Turns out @beyonddc pronounces s'mores "sa-mores" so I am now in the market for a divorce lawyer. Recs?
He has rush ordered the passport that he didn't fill the application out for, btw.
Didn't think you'd have to tell someone to have a completed application for a passport but a guy was just in line for an hour+ without one.
Someone had some misplaced confidence a couple years ago. https://t.co/or6fElxLL2
@genehack Upstate NY here & "warsh" is how my Albany-area grandpa still says it. Never heard of it as a southern thing. Hmm. @amaditalks
@genehack @mazzie I mean, you're not wrong. https://t.co/IkQGHmchaD
@genehack Always looking on the bright side, you are. @mazzie
@carrrrrie ...turns out I have no Oreos. Nor do I want to put pants on to go get Oreos. So there is my answer, I guess.
@carrrrrie Why am I NOT eating Oreos at 2am?!
@PhilthePill Dicks. THANKS A LOT, USELESS BOOK PEOPLE SELLING ALL THE WORLD'S KNOWLEDGE. https://t.co/XLaymD1ASJ
@PhilthePill His sister is cool too but literally just left Denver for work yesterday. Tattered Cover is the huge pretty bookstore downtown?
@PhilthePill My coolest Denver person is @brettmarshbanks but that asshole moved to Bristol on us. Hmm.
@PhilthePill Do you need Denver people or things?
@1followernodad Sobdiscussed this with spouse for 2 hours & your tweet showed up the second I opened Twitter & summed it in >140.
I'M TRYING TO WARN YOU PEOPLE. https://t.co/eHKDe6QmB3

Now on my third change of clothes in three hours. Guess we're trying to set records here.
Babies are assholes.

Is there a service that feeds & raises my child, delivers groceries, & runs my business for me?
Asking for a friend.

Going through two wardrobe changes in thirty minutes is why parents look like hobos in public.
Seriously, why tf do I bother trying?
@nikki_d Like roses as a state flower.
@nikki_d Oh we def don't have an exclusive on it. But it is our official.
Cannabis: The Official Perfume of Northeast DC
If y'all have friends like @LulaMaeDC & @NoPants_McGee in your lives, who'll come take your screaming baby for an hour, treasure them.
@NoPants_McGee It'll be fun, they said.
@NoPants_McGee 😕 We could have opened it a crack if we had thought to tell you sooner. I'm sorry.
@NoPants_McGee Oh, we assumed it was for leaving him but taking Lucy, since it was on the dog bed.
@gloriaevonne They can't be assholes straight through or we would leave them in the woods. Good break in the middle. Smart evolution.
@gloriaevonne I'm assuming toddler yrs, when she can do something/anything without me, will be more pleasant. Not sure if true, but I cling.
@gloriaevonne (I am still working on this one.)
@gloriaevonne That sounds like it blows. Be good to yourself, too. It's OK to be frustrated & annoyed & angry. It doesn't make you awful.
@gloriaevonne It gets better in fits and spurts. I no longer want to murder her on a regular basis, for one. Just occasionally.
@gloriaevonne You eventually ate?! Impressive! 👏👏👏👏 Spouse & I joke/not joke that 6 week smiles have saved humanity from dying out.
Watching the birds wake the baby up in real time on the monitor, & then watching her be like, "oh, just the birds," and go back to sleep. 🙌

I am home with the baby all day and I reheated two slices of pizza.
That was ambitious.
@mazzie Show. No. Mercy. 🚫🔪🐁🔪🚫
@mighty_pigeon I know, right? How awful.
@ashleyfeinberg A friend's coworker DID wake up from a coma late last month. She did not take it well. @mighty_pigeon
@aminanotameena But you would know what a calculator was and maybe how to operate it. ;) 😘
@aminanotameena But you're reasonable. If I said "but 30% of X should be Y," you could give me more than a blank stare.
